Stem: Greenish and squarish with velvety hairs when young, maturing to brown and rounded.
Leaves: Green on top with purplish-blue underside, with 3 prominent veins. Between 20 cm and 80 cm long. With velvety hairs when young.
Flowers: White to pink with 5 petals. Very small in large clusters of 1000 or more. With a sweet smell and very short lived.
FruitSeeds: Green, brown or orange ripening to purplish-black. Up to 7 mm diameter containing 50-200 tiny seeds.
